job_offer_letter.title: Job Offer Letter
job_offer_letter.description: A formal letter issued by an employer offering employment to a selected candidate.
job_offer_letter.preview:
Date: {{date}}

Dear {{candidate_name}},

We are pleased to offer you the position of {{job_title}} at {{company_name}}, subject to the terms and conditions outlined below.

1. Position and Department
You will be employed as {{job_title}} in the {{department}} department and will report to {{reporting_manager}}.

2. Compensation
Your total annual compensation (CTC) will be rs{{salary}}, payable as per company payroll policies.

3. Work Location
Your primary work location will be {{work_location}}. The company may require relocation or remote work as per business needs.

4. Joining Date
Your expected date of joining will be {{joining_date}}.

5. Probation Period
You will be on probation for a period of {{probation_period}} months from the date of joining.

6. Confidentiality
You are required to maintain strict confidentiality of company information during and after your employment.

7. Termination
Either party may terminate this employment by providing {{notice_period}} days written notice or salary in lieu thereof.

Please sign and return this letter as a token of your acceptance.

Sincerely,
{{hr_name}}
{{company_name}}

internship_offer_letter.title: Internship Offer Letter
internship_offer_letter.description: An official letter confirming selection for an internship program.
internship_offer_letter.preview:
Date: {{date}}

Dear {{candidate_name}},

We are pleased to offer you an internship opportunity at {{company_name}} as a {{internship_role}}.

1. Internship Duration
The internship will commence on {{start_date}} and conclude on {{end_date}}.

2. Stipend
You will receive a monthly stipend of rs{{stipend}} during the internship period.

3. Working Hours
Your working hours will be {{working_hours}}.

4. Confidentiality
All company data and intellectual property must be kept confidential.

This internship does not guarantee permanent employment.

Best regards,
{{company_name}}

job_agreement.title: Job Contract Agreement
job_agreement.description: A legally binding agreement between employer and employee defining employment terms.
job_agreement.preview:
This Job Contract Agreement is made on {{date}} between {{company_name}} and {{employee_name}}.

1. Designation
The employee is appointed as {{job_title}}.

2. Compensation
The employee shall be paid a salary of rs{{salary}} per annum.

3. Responsibilities
The employee agrees to perform duties assigned by the employer to the best of their ability.

4. Confidentiality and Non-Compete
The employee shall not disclose confidential information during or after employment.

5. Termination
This agreement may be terminated with {{notice_period}} days written notice by either party.

Signed by both parties as acceptance of terms.

rent_agreement.title: Rent Agreement
rent_agreement.description: A legal agreement between property owner and tenant outlining rental terms.
rent_agreement.preview:
This Rent Agreement is made on {{date}} between {{owner_name}} (Owner) and {{tenant_name}} (Tenant).

1. Property Details
The property is located at {{property_address}}.

2. Rent and Deposit
Monthly rent shall be rs{{rent_amount}} payable on {{rent_due_date}}.
Security deposit amount: rs{{security_deposit}}.

3. Agreement Duration
This agreement is valid from {{start_date}} to {{end_date}}.

4. Maintenance and Utilities
The tenant shall be responsible for utility and maintenance charges.

Both parties agree to the above terms and conditions.

nda.title: Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA)
nda.description: A legal contract to protect confidential information shared between parties.
nda.preview:
This Non-Disclosure Agreement is entered into on {{date}} between {{party_one}} and {{party_two}}.

1. Definition of Confidential Information
Confidential information includes all business, technical, and financial data shared.

2. Obligations
The receiving party agrees not to disclose confidential information to third parties.

3. Duration
This agreement shall remain in effect for {{nda_duration}} years.

4. Governing Law
This agreement shall be governed by the laws of {{jurisdiction}}.

Both parties acknowledge and agree to the terms stated above.
